text:
Thumbtack - San Francisco, CA - ONSITE

Thumbtack's mission is to help people accomplish their projects by matching them with the best service professionals in their area. From wedding photographers and DJs to home contractors or French tutors, Thumbtack can help.

We are backed by Sequoia, Google Capital, and Baillie Gifford. A friendly, ambitious team of ~50 engineers, we work in a bright SoMa office with daily home-cooked food and unlimited vacation.

We're looking for engineers, SREs, and data scientists interested in working with Go, Scala/Spark, machine learning, Angular, iOS, Android, full-stack, and AWS. Join us!

http://www.thumbtack.com/jobs http://www.thumbtack.com/engineering

Please reach out to (nate@)thumbtack.com with any questions.
